Write it in.

If you want the editorial to draw attention to a subject, you want to tell me something, send a press release if you have any questions, send us a message right off the website. Messages from the COMMITMENT site are read in writing.If you want us to call you back or write, tell me how you can get in touch.♪ Keep in mind that the messages that come from this page are not published.

Comments0
04.02.2024 14:00

The Chairman of the Russian Investigative Committee, Alexander Bastrekin, took personal control of the situation of improper servicing of the ICD in Volgograd. In particular, the Chief of the Force was interested in the CC Pearls. - In the media and social media, a 87-year-old woman who is a veteran of the Great Patriotic War and a disabled second group is reported to live in unsafe conditions...
